effect.scarlet_violet: Fails if not used on a sleeping Pokémon. Inflicts regular damage. Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.
effect.the_teal_mask: Fails if not used on a sleeping Pokémon. Inflicts regular damage. Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.
effect.the_indigo_disk: Fails if not used on a sleeping Pokémon. Inflicts regular damage. Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.

short_effect.scarlet_violet: Only works on sleeping Pokémon. Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.
short_effect.the_teal_mask: Only works on sleeping Pokémon. Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.
short_effect.the_indigo_disk: Only works on sleeping Pokémon. Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.

flavor_text.scarlet_violet: The user eats the dreams of a sleeping target. The user's HP is restored by up to half the damage taken by the target.
